name: Angel messenger
description:
Controls:

  1. A button to Talk/Move next
  2. Left mouse click to Interact with objects

A visual novel focusing on the angel messenger Uriel, who happily delivers mail between the living and the dead.

Plot:

A human visits Angel Mail post office, seeking assistance from Uriel. The devastated human wants to contact their lover whom recently crossed the rainbow bridge. Uriel is known as the bringer of divine light. Aiding those in need, especially when it comes to relationships and emotional healing. He happily takes on the request from the human, encouraging both the human and the ghost to reconcile, taking a lot of weight off their shoulders.
